creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
description: two sheets attached together in vertical format; top sheet has orange and tan ground with purple linear swirls and white linear geometric and organic design; bottom sheet has purple and lavender ground with pink and red cage-like linear designs and solid pink openwork flame-like form
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and C See Inscription
title: In Step Out of Step IX
